post.body: sounds like a good plan to me! i luv ice cream N any ol' excuse'll do! :)
for sure! who would have guessed?!
LOVE the jingle.....LOL....I knew Xmas was my fav holiday!
Luv this! I subscribe to the Youtube posts!
r u working at all nxt wk or heading 2 FL?
luv that site! 'be very afraid'!
i luv 2 live thru u, Buck! i don't have cable but always know the important stuff! :)
i'm hurt! I thought this was 'special' about us!
hey, thanks! I thought I could hear jingles! :)
wish I could! The bandwidth here is so paltry I can't! :(
have a good trip. Weather is much better there. Enjoy!
"Foofinella Rotunda" gives it that special ring! Nice job!
congrats! I luv that mag.
hey that doesn't sound like a bad thing! enjoy! it's been raining here; better than snow I guess.
r they generally good tho? i have nextel but thinking of switching 2 AT&T in Feb when my contract expires.
thinking i luv havin a snow day 2day! hmmm....what shall I do w/my time?!
being irked w/a super needy friend; why do ppl have 2 B so dramatic?!
thinking about the "top 5 record snowfall in history" http://www.freep.com/article/20081218/NEWS05/81218031/1001/rss01
thinking 2mrw will b a snow day! somewhere round 12 in of snow is fab! stay home N snowmobile everyone; dr.'s orders!
thinking it's crazy that I have almost 150 ppl on IM - who in the world talks that much?! LOL!
thinking Aunt Annie might welcome me w/some soft pretzels 2day! Yum!
thinking "Funky Chunky Chocolate Cookie" & Enviga is the breakfast of champs!
thinking about relabeling my files - what a mess! Key word....thinking about it! :p
LMAO @ the Go-Phone commercial w/the Gingerbread Man! 2 Fun-e!
watching "Away From Her" - why R previews always better than the movie itself?
thinking it's about time I get my booty out the dr 2 enjoy this New Yr! B safe all!
watching review of 08 on Today Show.....2 fun-e!
wondering just how much mucus 1 person's body can actually make! Uggg...sick of being sick!
name something that might b painful after getting a nose job.
totally takin it home on The Family Feud! I rock!
trying 2 force myself out of the house 2day; just want to stay in bed!
dreams of Simon Baker dance in my head like sugar plums!
Oh & I'm up @ 6:00 am! WTF?!
I'm upset I'm sick on my day off! Dang changing weather in MI all the time!
thinking Jim Carey in Yes Man is hilarious!
eating Lucky Charms in bed while feeling cruddy; damn sinuses!
wondering if Hallmark's Maxine is a Twitter-er? I'm a fan N would luv 2 follow. :)
finished watching Valkyrie N looking fwd 2 watching Benjamin Button 2morrow.
thinking the only relative I'd like 2 C @ my dr is Papa John!
reeling after watching Marley & Me!
